message: About to start a major Django ecommerce project that needs to handle multilingual fields (about 4 languages for launch but more in the pipeline).  I've looked at the various techniques for handling this but am not convinced as to one yet.
Would appreciate anyone's thoughts on the best way of handling this.  What the trade-offs are etc...
Also - I'm tempted by this technique: http://blog.rafaljonca.org/2009/03/third-style-of-django-multilingual-data.html
I've had good luck with django-modeltranslation + django-localeurl + django-rosetta.  Deployed my first site with it last week, was <1 day of work total to add it to the site
We have had a similar discussion before: https://convore.com/django-community/best-approach-for-model-translation-in-django/208433/
